TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdalException extends System.Exception

Docs.summary: The exception type thrown when an error occurs during token acquisition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the exception class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string errorCode) cil managed

Docs.param: The error code returned by the service or generated by client. This is the code you can rely on for exception handling.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the exception class with a specified error code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string errorCode, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The error code returned by the service or generated by client. This is the code you can rely on for exception handling.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified. It may especially contain the actual error message returned by the service.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the exception class with a specified error code and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string errorCode, string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The error code returned by the service or generated by client. This is the code you can rely on for exception handling.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the exception class with a specified error code and error message.

MemberSignature.Value: public AdalException (string errorCode, string message, Exception innerException);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string errorCode, string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The error code returned by the service or generated by client. This is the code you can rely on for exception handling.
The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
The exception that is the cause of the current exception, or a null reference if no inner exception is specified. It may especially contain the actual error message returned by the service.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the exception class with a specified error code, error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
Gets the protocol error code returned by the service or generated by client. This is the code you can rely on for exception handling.

Docs.summary: Creates and returns a string representation of the current exception.
